DOC.brief_summary: The purpose BIOLUX P-III BENELUX Registry investigate safety clinical performance Passeo-18 Lux Drug Coated Ballon use daily clinical practice treatment isolate atherosclerotic lesion ( vessel narrow ) popliteal artery
DOC.criteria: Age ≥ 18 year minimum age require local regulation Subject must willing sign Patient Data Release Form ( PDRF ) Patient Informed Consent ( PIC ) applicable Lesion ( ) popliteal artery suitable endovascular treatment , treat schedule treated Passeo18 Lux drug coat balloon . Isolated popliteal artery lesion : least 2 cm healthy segment lesion ( ) popliteal artery lesion ( ) distal superficial femoral artery Inflow free flowlimiting lesion . Patients flowlimiting inflow lesion ( > 50 % stenosis ) include lesion ( ) treat successfully index procedure , maximum residual stenosis 30 % per visual assessment At least one native artery direct outflow artery foot Rutherford classification 25 Patient bypass surgery limb enrol least 2 cm healthy segment popliteal artery anastomosis Life expectancy ≤ 1 year Rutherford classification 6 Lesion involve superficial femoral artery ( arterial intersection femur anteroposterior view ) extend infrapopliteal artery ( origin anterior tibial artery tibioperoneal trunk ) Aneurysm level popliteal artery Failure successfully cross target lesion guide wire ( successful crossing mean tip guide wire distal target lesion absence flow limit dissection perforation ) Intraprocedural decision proceed Passeo18 Lux DCB reason related device ( instance blood flow limit dissection predilatation ) Subject currently participate another investigational drug device study reach primary endpoint yet Subject pregnant planning become pregnant course study
